name: Ramada Encore Bournemouth

reviews.text: Have stayed here many times on business trips. Length of stay ranged from a single night to 4 or 5 nights.
reviews.title: Informal hotel but lovely accommodation

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Staff are excellent, friendly and efficient. Evening meals are ok, best described as basic bar food, ranging from Pizzas to Jacket Potatoes, to fish & chips etc. Breakfast is a buffet style, help yourself options - plenty of choices including cereals, toast, full english, croissants etc ..
reviews.title: Really good hotel at a great price.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Wouldn't really recommend for families as there are not that many facilities in the hotel. Ideal for business travellers, or couples though.
reviews.title: Return visit

reviews.text: The manager welcomes feedback, and does reply to the comments that I have left, and even acted on a couple of my suggestions too !
reviews.title: great stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Would I come back ? Yes, definitely - it's my first choice of hotel when I'm staying in the area.
reviews.title: Pratical, good location for the beach, bathroom not great

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel was booked through hot wires secret hotels so it wasn't until after we paid we were told where we would be staying, I am very pleased with the hotel that was chosen. We came here for a very short break and enjoyed every minute of it. The hotel is clean, spacious and very modern. We had a double room and it was very big, the bathroom was also very spacious!
reviews.title: Lovely hotel and great location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The location is great for going down to the beach but also shopping in town.
reviews.title: Does what it says on the tin, but with a few niggles

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Some places charge for car parking whereas here it was free so that was a bonus.
reviews.title: Superb
Amazingly brilliant!!
reviews.text: We had breakfast on one of the mornings and I was very impressed by the choice and quality of the food that they had.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Overall a great stay and I would definetly come back!
reviews.title: Great Weekend in Bournemouth

reviews.text: If you are looking for a clean, functional and efficient place to stay in bournemouth, Ramada Encore provides it. It is in town (along Bath Road) but within walking distance to the Beach as well as to the shopping streets of Old Christchurch.
reviews.title: Clean, functional and efficient

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I like it for its clean and functional concept. I have also stayed at a hotel nearer the beach previously but finds Ramada offers the better value for your money in trading off the short walk to the beach (around 5-10 mins).
reviews.title: Charmless but clean and functional

reviews.text: My heading says it all, stay here if you are only using the hotel to sleep in, not for a romantic cosy getaway.
reviews.title: comfortable, modern, and clean
One or two nights really
reviews.text: The rooms and open areas are very functional and clean, the staff was helpful and friendly, there was free parking and WiFi and we were on the top floor (which we were kindly moved to on request), so didn't have anyone potentially stampeding in the room above (wooden flooring in the bedrooms). Bed was comfortable, aircon cold. Our roomkeycard didn't work on three occasions, many people appeared to have this problem, as the machine was faulty. Breakfast was basic, but fine.

Nothing negative to say, only that the hotel lacks charm and atmosphere - like Bournemouth itself. Should you not be that keen on stag and hen nights and dodging vomit and unconscious revellers on the pavement, I suggest you avoid Old Christchurch Road on a weekend.
reviews.title: Great Budget Hotel

reviews.text: We managed to book this Hotel on a good deal with Breakfast via Bookings.com, they have parking on-site.
reviews.title: poor mattress

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The room was very nice - good bathroom with walk-in shower and generally very modern and clean.
reviews.title: A very good weekender

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: the down side is that we found it to be the worst mattress we have encountered in a hotel room for many years. we ended up getting an extra duvet which helped on the second night. the one thing you need is a good nights sleep and unfortunately we did not get.
reviews.title: Good value for Bournemouth
Clean, comfortable, soulless
reviews.text: Anyhow breakfast is ok. Some fresh fruit / yoghurt and a hot buffet, juice, tea / coffee etc.
I am sorry if a little negative but a good nights sleep is a priority to us.
reviews.title: Good location, helpful staff, average mattress!

description: Brand new contemporary hotel, close to the town centre, shops and sea. With 114 bedrooms the Ramada Encore Bournemouth is an exciting new hotel experience. The concept is simple - fresh, stylish, vibrant and upbeat, with comfortable, contemporary accommodation. Rooms include doubles, twins and wheelchair accessible twin rooms. All bedrooms are air-conditioned, with power shower, internet access, generous work area, and more. Car parking on site with no extra charge, and a licensed bar.
